BISBASMetadata.description: Behavioral Inhibition Scale Behavioral Approach Scale

bisbas_1.description: If I think something unpleasent is going to happen I get pretty 'worked up'.

bisbas_3.description: Criticism or scolding hurts me quite a bit.

bisbas_4.description: I feel pretty worried or upset when I think or know somebody is angry at me.

bisbas_5.description: Even if something bad is about to happen to me, I rarely experience fear or nervousness.

bisbas_6.description: I feel worried when I think I have done something poorly.

bisbas_7.description: I have very few fears compared to my friends.

bisbas_8.description: When I get something I want, I feel excited and energized.

bisbas_9.description: When I'm doing well at something, I love to keep at it.

bisbas_10.description: When good things happen to me it affects me strongly.

bisbas_11.description: It would excite me to win a contest.

bisbas_12.description: When I see an opportunity for something I like, I get excited right away.

bisbas_13.description: When I want something I usually go all out to get it.

bisbas_14.description: I go out of my way to get things I want.

bisbas_15.description: If I see a chance to get something I want, I move on it right away.

bisbas_16.description: When I go after something I use a 'no holds barred' approach'.

bisbas_17.description: I will often do things for no other reason than that they might be fun.

bisbas_18.description: I crave excitement and new sensations.

bisbas_19.description: I am always willing to try something new if I think it will be fun.

bisbas_20.description: I often act on the spur of the moment.
